ValidationRule.description: when users select the HRS Hold Out checkbox they must supply an expiration date unless the permanent hold out description is Strategic Account Team
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), HRS_Hold_Out__c = true, ISBLANK( HRS_Hold_Out_Expiration__c ), ISPICKVAL( HRS_Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, ""), NOT ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, "Strategic Account Team") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** You are required to set the HRS Hold out Expiration date when checking the Hold out checkbox ****
